channel.title: 7 Pounds
channel.description:
I liked this movie, but it wasn't like it was portray in the commercials.
SPOILERZ DON'T GET ANGREE IF U SEE WUT IS DER [size=6pt]Tim had a wife, and one night while turning off his phone he crashed into a car, and into a bus. The bus was filled with 7 people, and they all died along with his wife. He goes around seeking nice people who truely need transplants, or a new life and helping them with that. He meets a girl that he falls in love with. He finds out near the end that the chance of her getting a transplant would be 5%, so Tim makes a call, that you hear him make at the begining saying "there has been a suicide the victom was me" and his body is taken to a hospital where the sevend people he found get what they need. One woman however, wasn't given an organ, but a now home away from an abusive boyfriend. The story ends right after Tim kills himself by allowing a jellyfish to kill him [/size] 10/10 Very good movie.

item.description:
@Gore wrote:

The bus was filled with 7 people [Davidude36: Spoiler below]

[size=1pt]Actualy it killed 6 people on the bus and the 7th person was his wife then he killed himself with a killer squird!!! AMG[/size]
[center] Spoilers, they ruin the movie for people, please use tiny text or some other way of hiding the spoilers in future.[/center]

item.title: 7 Pounds
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

You know the movie was great.

I loved it, it had such a great plot.
Will Smith did the character perfect, and the ending was amazing with his death, and the final scene between her and ezra.

10/10
